comment: I wanted to like this whiskey, but the agave taste is very strong.  Beneath this you get notes of vanilla and caramel, but you really have to go deep.  It’s great for margaritas and whiskey sours though 😬.
Decent. No special characteristics, but not offensive either. A decent daily if it's not too expensive

I really wanted to like this whiskey.  I live close by, know the owners a little, and I really like the staff at the distillery.  

I'm sure it will improve with age, but the 24 month currently available is good except for a slight aftertaste I can't quite explain. I am looking forward to trying longer aged examples to see if it goes away.  

It may be something others enjoy more and I encourage you to try it out for yourselves.  I'll certainly try it again.
Maybe my new favorite Tennessee whiskey. Smooth, complex, delicious.
Young release at 2 years.  Look forward to revisiting a 4 year or more release.
